price: 13. Seehadaytuh woo ayró taamak yuysukumem kee wadirroysem warsintah.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
